user_query: I want to surprise my family with a vacation to a beautiful beach destination. Can you suggest some popular beach towns in California? Provide information about the nearest airports, accommodations, and attractions in these towns. Additionally, check the availability and prices of flights and hotels for our preferred travel dates.

TaskList.description: Research and list popular beach towns in California.
Gather information about the nearest airports for each beach town.
Find accommodations available in each beach town.
Compile a list of attractions in each beach town.
Check availability and prices of flights to the nearest airports.
Check availability and prices of hotels in beach towns for preferred travel dates.
